Title: Relates to floor area ratio requirements for buildings on farms
Summary: Requires floor area ratio requirements for buildings on farms to be no more restrictive than state requirements for zoning purposes.
LawCode: Amd ยง264, Town L; amd ยง7-710, Vil L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law and the village law, in relation to floor area ratio requirements for buildings on farms
